title: Antitoxic
background: A response to social media attacks from those who create nothing; a song about vital energy and positive frequency.
lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah.
I see the red notifications.
I see the shadows in the comments.
But you know what?
The frequency is changing.

[Verse 1]
You’re typing loud from a silent room
Trying to weave a web of gloom
"Not an artist," yeah, that’s the line
But I don’t see your light shine
I clicked your name, I scrolled the feed
But there’s no harvest, you didn’t sow a seed
An empty channel, a hollow screen
Just a ghost in a digital machine.

[Pre-Chorus]
You’re throwing stones at a glassless house
Quiet as a keyboard, quiet as a mouse
But the rhythm in my chest is beating too fast
To let a little bit of poison ever last.

[Chorus]
My vibe is Antitoxic
I’m breathing in the light, I’m the logic
You can’t pull me down to the basement floor
I’m opening a window, I’m opening a door
It’s vital, it’s golden, it’s alive
I don’t just exist, I arrive
Yeah, my music is the cure, it’s the tonic
Purely Antitoxic.

[Verse 2]
Show me your canvas, show me your soul
Instead of trying to dig me a hole
If you’ve got the vision, then let it out
But all I’m hearing is a muffled shout
I’m building bridges, you’re burning air
I’m making magic, and you’re just there
Comparing my "now" to your "never"
I’m moving forward, I’m clever.

[Guitar solo]

[Bridge]
Energy is currency.
Why spend yours on me?
I’m a forest fire, you’re a spark
I’m the daylight, you’re the dark
But I’m not angry, I’m just free
From the weight of your philosophy.

[Chorus]
My vibe is Antitoxic
I’m breathing in the light, I’m the logic
You can’t pull me down to the basement floor
I’m opening a window, I’m opening a door
It’s vital, it’s golden, it’s alive
I don’t just exist, I arrive
Yeah, my music is the cure, it’s the tonic
Purely Antitoxic.

[Outro]
Keep your shadows, I’ll keep the sun
The song is just beginning, I’ve already won
Empty channels, full heart
This is the life, this is the art.
Antitoxic...
Stay vital.

title: Avalanche
background: A strong relationship where you are deeply involved in emotionally often has the force of an avalanche
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It started with a hairline fracture
A word you didn't say, a look I couldn't catch
We’ve been living on this incline for a season
Waiting for the gravity to match
The air is getting thin, the sky is turning slate
I feel the shiver in the shelf beneath my feet
They say the silence is the loudest right before
The white-out makes the burial complete.

[Pre-Chorus]
One cold breath, one heavy step
The kind of secrets that we shouldn’t have kept
The pressure's building till the crystals break
How much weight can one heartbeat take?

[Chorus]
And it’s an Avalanche
Coming down to claim the valley of us
Turning every vow we made into dust
You can’t outrun it, you can’t scream for air
It’s beautiful and breathless and it’s everywhere
We’re going under, frozen in the dance
Buried in the hollow of this avalanche.

[Verse 2]
They’ll find us in a thousand years
Locked in this position, static in the blue
I used to fear the cold until I realized
The coldest part of winter was wanting you
There’s a power in the way we fall apart
A kinetic rush that shadows out the sun
Now the house is gone, the map is erased
And there’s nowhere left for us to run.

[Bridge]
It’s not a flood, it’s not a fire
It’s a mountain losing its entire
Weight upon our shoulders, white and blind
Leaving everything we knew behind
Don't fight the slide, don't try to rise
Just look at me with those ice-crag eyes.

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
Yeah, it’s an Avalanche
Coming down to claim the valley of us
Turning every vow we made into dust
You can’t outrun it, you can’t scream for air
It’s beautiful and breathless and it’s everywhere
We’re going under, frozen in the dance
Buried in the hollow of this avalanche.

[Outro]
The snow is settling now...
Everything is quiet.
Everything is white.
Just you and me...
Under the weight.
Under the white.

title: Betrayal
background: When your friend cheats on you it's a painful experience. Try to take it at easy as possible.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We shared the same coffee, the same morning air
I trusted your shadow, I thought you’d be there
Through the nights I was working, lost in the climb
I thought you were cheering, not just biding your time.
But I saw how you looked in that silk, paper-thin
A dress built for silence, to let the world in
And I saw how he folded, how quickly he fell
For a story so shallow even you couldn't tell.

[Chorus]
I was building a future, you were tearing a seam
You traded a lifetime for a flickering gleam.
It’s a heavy-heart lesson, a bitter-sweet song
To realize the person I loved was just wrong.
You can keep the attention, the glances, the lace
But you’ll never fill up all the emptiness in his face
I’m walking away with my head in the light
Because I’m far too much for a man this slight.

[Verse 2]
I spent my life learning the weight of a thought
While you practiced the angles of things to be bought.
You gave him the glitter, the easy, the brief
And he took it like water, a common-born thief.
I used to think value was something we grew
But he’s looking for mirrors, and he found one in you.
Go on, wear the outfit that says what you lack
I’m finally leaving, and I’m not looking back.

[Bridge]
It’s funny how clearly the patterns emerge
When the lies and the loyalty finally diverge.
I’m not broken or bitter, I’m just seeing the truth
I wasted my wisdom on the ghost of his youth.
He wanted a surface, a flicker, a spark
While I was the fire that held back the dark.

[Chorus]
I was building a future, you were tearing a seam
You traded a lifetime for a flickering gleam.
It’s a heavy-heart lesson, a bitter-sweet song
To realize the person I loved was just wrong.
You can keep the attention, the glances, the lace
But you’ll never fill up all the emptiness in his face
I’m walking away with my head in the light
Because I’m far too much for a man this slight.

[Outro]
I’m packing my mind and I’m clearing the shelf
I’m finally back to just being myself.
I don’t need to fix what was broken so long
His preferences, truly, were always set wrong.
Yeah, they were always set wrong.
Goodbye to the shallow.
Goodbye to you both.

title: Brooklyn
background: An artistic answer to attacks from Brooklyn elitists.
lyrics:
[Intro]
Welcome to the Exhibition.
Please do not touch the artists... they are very fragile.

[Verse 1]
Sitting in the basement, guarding the gate
Talking 'bout the struggle, talking 'bout fate
You got the vintage filter, you got the look
Reading from the same old dusty book
"Analog warmth" just to hide the cold
Selling a story that’s already sold
You think the scratch on the record is "Art"
But it’s just the sound of a stopping heart.

[Pre-Chorus]
You’re scared of the edge, so you round it off
You hear the machine and you start to scoff
But while you were polishing a rusty crown
I built a cathedral in the center of town.

[Chorus]
Welcome to the Museum!
Where nothing ever changes, nothing is new
Just a hollow cage for the chosen few!
You call it "Soul", I call it a grave
You’re not a rebel, you’re just a slave—
To the loop! To the box! To the gallery wall!
I’m the Architect watching the Gentry fall!
WATCH THE GENTRY FALL!

[Verse 2]
Let’s talk power, let’s talk facts
You hide your range in the reverb tracks
You play in circles, safe and slow
That’s why your melody has nowhere to go
You’re terrified of the fire, scared of the shift
Stuck on the ground, missing the lift
You want the "Vibe" but you can’t pay the price
Rolling the same old weighted dice.

[Bridge]
You fought the future.
You fought the code.
And while you were screaming... the Labels reload.
They took your sound.
They bought your street.
Now you’re just a ghost on a corporate beat.

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
Welcome to the Museum!
Where nothing ever changes, nothing is new
Just a hollow cage for the chosen few!
You call it "Soul", I call it a grave
You’re not a rebel, you’re just a slave!
Burn the gallery! Break the wall!
I’m the Architect watching the Gentry fall!

[Outro]
Compare the harvest.
The Museum is closed!

title: Disposable
background: From the "Good Enough" series; an ironic take on flat mainstream music with low-effort melodies.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Lights are low.
Just a guitar now.
This is the part.
Where we try to be real.
We had a fight.
Or maybe we didn't.
It doesn't matter much.
It's just the format.

[Pre-Chorus]
They said make it easy.
They said make it simple.
The melody is slow.
The harmony is sad.
It feels more honest.
When there is no bass.

[Chorus]
Oh-oh-oh. I need you close.
Yeah-yeah-yeah. Let's take it higher.
I need the chorus. It needs to work now.
This is the product. I call it trash.
(I call it trash).
It is disposable. No turning back.

[Verse 2]
Look at the numbers.
The money is rising.
The formula works.
Even when it is quiet.
I'm singing softer.
To sound more vulnerable.
The emotion is faked.
But the reverb is gone.

[Pre-Chorus]
They said make it easy.
They said make it simple.
The melody is slow.
The harmony is sad.
It feels more honest.
When there is no bass.

[Chorus]
Oh-oh-oh. I need you close.
Yeah-yeah-yeah. Let's take it higher.
I need the chorus. It needs to work now.
This is the product. I call it trash.
(I call it trash).
It is disposable. No turning back.

[Bridge]
No big drama.
Just a single tear drop.
This is the part.
Where we feel something small.
Now it is over.
The moment is gone.

[Outro]
Disposable.
It was only for show.

title: Dynamite
background: Capturing the energy and self-consciousness of women who attract attention the moment they enter a room.
lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah...
Watch out now.
She’s entering the room.
Keep it tight!

[Verse 1]
She don't walk, she glides on the pavement
A neon silhouette in the basement
Got a velvet coat and a gaze like a laser
Looking for trouble? Well, she’s the flavor.
Bartender shaking, spilling the gin
She gives a little wink and the chaos begins
Don’t ask for her number, don’t ask for her name
You’re just a moth flying into the flame!

[Pre-Chorus]
She’s got the rhythm (Uh!)
Locked in her bones
She’s got a heart made of rolling stones!

[Chorus]
She’s a wild one, mamma mia!
Electric shock, pure hysteria
Signorina Dynamite, ready to blow
Spinning round like a disco globe!
She’s a wild one, can’t you see?
A catastrophe in a minor key
Don’t try to tame her, don’t try to fight
You’re gonna dance with the Dynamite
Tonight!

[Verse 2]
She eats danger for breakfast, honey, no lie
She’ll steal your car and wave goodbye
Zero to sixty in a blink of an eye
She’s the funky queen of the Gemini.
Some say she’s crazy, some say she’s free
I say she’s exactly who she wants to be
So clear the floor, give her room to breathe
Before she brings this whole joint to its knees!

[Chorus] She’s a wild one, mamma mia!
Electric shock, pure hysteria
Signorina Dynamite, ready to blow
Spinning round like a disco globe!
She’s a wild one, can’t you see?
A catastrophe in a minor key
Don’t try to tame her, don’t try to fight
You’re gonna dance with the Dynamite
Tonight!

[Bridge]
Ascolta bene, non fare il pazzo
Questa ragazza ti fa il mazzo!
Cammina svelta, tacchi a spillo
Ti mangia vivo wie ein coccodrillo.
È fuoco puro, brucia la pista
La donna più bella sulla tua lista.
Non si ferma mai, no stop, vai!
Sei pronto a perdere? Dimmi, lo sai?
Roma, Milano, Napoli funk
Lei porta il groove wie ein Slam Dunk!
Lasciala andare, è pericolosa
Bella, cattiva, e velenosa!

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
She’s a wild one, mamma mia!
Electric shock, pure hysteria
Signorina Dynamite, ready to blow
Spinning round like a disco globe!
She’s a wild one, can’t you see?
A catastrophe in a minor key
Don’t try to tame her, don’t try to fight
You’re gonna dance with the Dynamite
Tonight!

[Outro]
Dynamite!
Che ragazza!
Don't touch the fuse...
She's gonna blow!
Ciao bella!

title: Embers and Sparks
background: Reflecting on old couples who still hold hands; a meditation on whether love can last 50 years.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
There’s a bench by the oak tree where the sidewalk ends
I watch them sit down like two best friends
He takes a handkerchief out of his vest
Dusts off the wood so her coat doesn't mess
She laughs a sound like dry leaves in the wind
He smiles at a joke that’s deep under his skin
They aren't saying much, they don't need the words
Just watching the people and feeding the birds.

[Pre-Chorus]
And here we are, racing the sun down the street
Burning on adrenaline and skipping a beat
Terrified that silence means something is wrong
Wondering if we’re gonna last quite that long.

[Chorus]
’Cause we are the fireworks, loud and bright
But they are the candle that lasts through the night
We are the hurricane, crashing and fast
They are the shelter built to last
I don’t want a love that just burns out the dark
I want the embers, not just the spark
Oh, baby, look at them, then look at me
That’s who I want us to be.

[Verse 2]
I saw her fixing the collar of his shirt
With hands that have seen all the joy and the hurt
He offered his arm when it was time to go
Moving through molasses, steady and slow
You squeezed my hand tight when we walked on by
Like you were afraid I might float to the sky
But looking at them, I’m learning the truth
That romance is more than just wasted on youth.

[Chorus]
’Cause we are the fireworks, loud and bright
But they are the candle that lasts through the night
We are the hurricane, crashing and fast
They are the shelter built to last
I don’t want a love that just burns out the dark
I want the embers, not just the spark
Oh, baby, look at them, then look at me
That’s who I want us to be.

[Bridge]
It’s not about never getting bored or old
It’s having a hand that you still want to hold
When the skin gets thin and the memories fade
It’s about honoring the mess that you made
Together.

[Instrumental Break]

[Outro]
He opens the car door, she slides inside
Fifty years later, she’s still his bride
I look at you, and I squeeze back tight
I think we can make it through the night.
Yeah, I want the embers...
Not just the spark
Let’s be the embers.

title: Fences Down
background: A plea for the evolution of music and a rebellion against ancestors, celebrating pure vitality and freedom.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I used to live in a house made of glass
Watching the seasons and the polite people pass
Keep the shirt tucked in, keep the heartbeat slow
Walking the lines where they tell you to go
But you crashed in like a gale force wind
Smashing the windows and soaking my skin
Now the roof is gone and the sky is gray
And I wouldn’t have it any other way.

[Pre-Chorus]
Rip up the map, throw the compass in the dirt
I want the adrenaline, I want the hurt
Of feeling something real, something raw like this
A forest fire hidden in a single kiss.

[Chorus]
Let it run wild, let it run deep
It’s a promise that the civilized just can’t keep
We are the wolves at the edge of the town
We are the sound of the fences falling down
It’s untamed, baby, it’s off the chain
Dancing barefoot in the freezing rain
I don’t want the safety, I don’t want the mild
Give me the untamed, give me the wild.

[Verse 2]
They say we’re dangerous, they say we’re a mess
Two loaded guns in a wedding dress
But I’d rather burn out bright and fast
Than sit in the corner and make it last
You taste like copper, you taste like sparks
We’re navigating solely by the darks
No gravity here, just the pull of the blood
Drag me through the river, drag me through the mud.

[Pre-Chorus]
Cut the brakes, let the engine scream
Wake me up from the American dream
I want the friction, I want the bliss
Of a cliff-edge moment just like this.

[Chorus]
Let it run wild, let it run deep
It’s a promise that the civilized just can’t keep
We are the wolves at the edge of the town
We are the sound of the fences falling down
It’s untamed, baby, it’s off the chain
Dancing barefoot in the freezing rain
I don’t want the safety, I don’t want the mild
Give me the untamed, give me the wild.

[Bridge]
Let the neighbors talk
Let the sirens wail
We’re writing our own
Twisted fairy tale
No logic here
No rules apply
Just you and me
And the open sky...
AND THE OPEN SKY!

[Guitar Solo]
[Chorus]
Let it run wild, let it run deep
It’s a promise that the civilized just can’t keep
We are the wolves at the edge of the town
We are the sound of the fences falling down
It’s untamed, baby, it’s off the chain
Dancing barefoot in the freezing rain
I don’t want the safety, I don’t want the mild
Give me the untamed, give me the wild.

[Outro]
Yeah, give me the wild.
Tear the fences down.
Let 'em watch us burn.
Wild.
Untamed.

title: Four Chords Later
background: Part of the "Good Enough" series, mocking the predictable formulas used to maximize streams.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Check the manual. We use the same loop.
It cycles nicely. It always works well.
The key is C minor. Or maybe G flat.
It doesn't matter much. The filter does the job.
Verse one is done now. That took one minute.
The structure is steady. It is predictable.

[Pre-Chorus]
We are still using. The same four chords.
The sequence is simple. It is universally loved.
I change the rhythm. Just a little bit now.
The bass notes shift. Just to pretend.
We are moving forward. We are progressing.
But the foundation. It will not move.

[Chorus]
Four chords later. We have a song here.
Four chords later. The structure is fixed.
Four chords later. We are hitting the charts now.
Four chords later. The feeling is fake.
It saves us time. It saves us money.
It maximizes streams. It is all we need.

[Verse 2]
The boss called me. Said the deadline is tight.
They need the master. By lunch today now.
I cannot change it. I cannot expand.
The complexity is lost. The simplicity sells.
Just add the Auto-Tune. And layer the vocals.
It must sound expensive. But must be quick.

[Pre-Chorus]
We are still using. The same four chords.
The sequence is simple. It is universally loved.
I change the rhythm. Just a little bit now.
The bass notes shift. Just to pretend.
We are moving forward. We are progressing.
But the foundation. It will not move.

[Chorus]
Four chords later. We have a song here.
Four chords later. The structure is fixed.
Four chords later. We are hitting the charts now.
Four chords later. The feeling is fake.
It saves us time. It saves us money.
It maximizes streams. It is all we need.

[Bridge]
Why break the system? If the system works well?
The formula is known. It will not fail us.
The audience accepts it. They embrace the loop.
This is the product. No need to resist.

[Chorus]
Four chords later. We have a song here.
Four chords later. The structure is fixed.
Four chords later. We are hitting the charts now.
Four chords later. The feeling is fake.
It saves us time. It saves us money.
It maximizes streams. It is all we need.

title: Frozen Heart
background: A version of Hans Christian Andersen’s Snow Queen, inspired by the chilling beauty of an ice carving exhibition.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The winter came without a sound
And stole the warmth right from the ground
I saw the splinter in your eye
A jagged piece of a broken sky
You turned away, your blood ran cold
A story that the North Wind told
Now there’s a carriage in the mist
Leading to a kingdom that shouldn't exist.

[Pre-Chorus]
My shoes are worn, my feet are bare
I’m breathing in the silver air
They say the frost will take my mind
But I won't leave your soul behind.

[Chorus]
I’m coming for the heart she froze
Through the stinging white and the heavy snows
She sits upon her throne of glass
Waiting for the years to pass
But she doesn't know what a spark can do
In a world of white and a world of blue
I’ll melt the walls, I’ll break the spell
And bring you back from her winter hell.

[Verse 2]
The Northern Lights begin to dance
Above a silent, crystalline trance
I find you in the Great White Hall
Piecing together a frozen fall
You’re arranging shards of jagged ice
Paying her cold and hollow price
You look at me but you do not see
The ghost of who we used to be.

[Bridge]
It’s not a knife that cuts the gale
It’s not a shield that will prevail
Just a single tear upon your chest
To put the winter king to rest
Can you feel the pulse? Can you feel the beat?
The ice is dying beneath our feet.

[Instrumental Break]

[Chorus]
I’m coming for the heart she froze
Through the stinging white and the heavy snows
She sits upon her throne of glass
Waiting for the years to pass
But she doesn't know what a spark can do
In a world of white and a world of blue
I’ve melted the walls, I’ve broken the spell
We’re leaving now from her winter hell.

[Outro]
The flowers wait beneath the deep
The summer's just been fast asleep
Let the palace crumble, let the crown fall
We’re walking home, past the garden wall...
Past the garden wall.
Home.

title: Garage Band
background: I played the synth. Our bassist was the pastor's daughter, so we were able to rehearse in the church rooms.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Woke up on a Monday, sun in my eyes
Another day in this concrete disguise
Coffee's cold and the rent is due
Got a hole in my jeans and a broken shoe
But there's a hum in my head, a rhythm in my soul
Tonight we'll plug in and lose control

[Chorus]
Three chords, two mics, one beat on the floor
Spilling our guts through the basement door
Amplifier hums and the feedback screams
Chasing down our rock and roll dreams
Sweat and dust and a broken string
Yeah, this is the only song we wanna sing
Just a four-piece band in a rusty old van
Give it all we got, yeah, that's the plan!

[Verse 2]
The neighbor's banging on the wall again
Says we're too loud, "When's it gonna end?"
Tell him to chill, we're making some art
Yeah, this is the sound of a beating heart
My fingers are sore and my throat is raw
Against the odds, defying the law
Of boring jobs and a quiet life
We're cutting through it like a rusty knife

[Chorus]
Three chords, two mics, one beat on the floor
Spilling our guts through the basement door
Amplifier hums and the feedback screams
Chasing down our rock and roll dreams
Sweat and dust and a broken string
Yeah, this is the only song we wanna sing
Just a four-piece band in a rusty old van
Give it all we got, yeah, that's the plan!

[Bridge]
Yeah, the club's a dive and the pay is cheap
But the feeling we get is something deep
A little bit of magic, a little bit of noise
For all the girls and all the boys
Who feel like us, who don't fit in
Let's crank it up and let the show begin!

[Guitar solo]

[Chorus]
Three chords, two mics, one beat on the floor
Spilling our guts through the basement door
Amplifier hums and the feedback screams
Chasing down our rock and roll dreams
Sweat and dust and a broken string
Yeah, this is the only song we wanna sing
Just a four-piece band in a rusty old van
Give it all we got, yeah, that's the plan!

[Outro]
Yeah... the plan...
Just the hum...

title: Good Enough
background: The flagship song of the "Good Enough" series, mimicking the flat, standard vibe of modern radio trash.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Woke up. Sun was bright.
Checked my phone. Felt okay.
I have a feeling. It is mild.
Thinking about stuff. Things I must do.

[Pre-Chorus]
Air is fine. Music plays.
I stand here. No worries now.
It is another day. Everything is fine.
Take a breath. They always say that.

[Chorus]
This is a good moment.
Sky is kind of blue.
I am just moving.
This is okay for me.
We are here. Doing the thing.
It is a standard vibe.
Things are steady now.
Rhythm comes and goes.

[Verse 2]
Saw you. You were near.
You were just standing. You looked neutral.
We looked at each other. We smiled a bit.
We can hang out. Maybe later.

[Pre-Chorus]
Air is fine. Music plays.
I stand here. No worries now.
It is another day. Everything is fine.
Take a breath. They always say that.

[Chorus]
This is a good moment.
Sky is kind of blue.
I am just moving.
This is okay for me.
We are here. Doing the thing.
It is a standard vibe.
Things are steady now.
Rhythm comes and goes.

[Bridge]
No big drama. Flow is smooth.
Where next? I do not know. We will go.
It is simple. Everyone likes this.
This is how things are. This is how I feel.

[Chorus]
This is a good moment.
Sky is kind of blue.
I am just moving.
This is okay for me.
We are here. Doing the thing.
It is a standard vibe.
Things are steady now.
Rhythm comes and goes.

[Outro]
Go. Go.
Good enough.
Fine now.

title: Heart of Fire and Ice
background: A hommage to the Nordic landscape and its duality of warmth and cold.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The wind bites sharp, a whisper from the polar sea,
Across the midnight sun, where shadows flee.
I stand upon the fjords, carved by ancient ice,
A thousand shades of blue, a chilling paradise.
The moss clings green to stones that the glaciers dropped,
In silent valleys where the world has almost stopped.
A rugged coast that takes the ocean's hardest blow,
Watching the tireless, tidal waters ebb and flow.

[Pre-Chorus]
But beneath the snow and the stone-cold ground,
A fierce and molten heat can still be found.
A promise burning deep, a wild and primal call,
Ready to erupt and change it all.

[Chorus]
Hjartað er eldur og ís,
Landið er draumur og ljós.
Undir norðurljósunum,
Finnum við friðinn í foss.

[Verse 2]
Through Sweden's deep forests, where the moose still roam,
Past Norway's mountain spine, I've made my temporary home.
From Denmark's sandy coasts to Finland's thousand lakes,
A silent, sweeping majesty the breath forever takes.
The geysers plume and sigh, a steam that hides the sky,
As black sand beaches meet the waves that crash and die.
A landscape sculpted by a hand that knew no compromise,
Reflecting back the deep, cold wonder in our eyes.

[Pre-Chorus]
But beneath the snow and the stone-cold ground,
A fierce and molten heat can still be found.
A promise burning deep, a wild and primal call,
Ready to erupt and change it all.

[Chorus]
Hjartað er eldur og ís,
Landið er draumur og ljós.
Undir norðurljósunum,
Finnum við friðinn í foss.

[Solo]

[Bridge]
Oh, the silence here is louder than any city sound,
In this place where myth and history are truly bound.
The Viking spirits whisper on the gale,
Telling an unending, epic tale.

[Chorus]
Hjartað er eldur og ís,
Landið er draumur og ljós.
Undir norðurljósunum,
Finnum við friðinn í foss.

title: I Hate You
background: Explores the neglect in relationships; a reminder that the opposite of love is not hate, but indifference.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I’m talking to the back of your head again
While you’re staring at the screen, counting digital friends
I poured my heart out, laid it on the floor
You didn’t even look up, just pointed at the door
You say I’m "too much," say I’m "acting wild"
Then you pat me on the shoulder like a bitter child
Every word is a needle, every look is a blade
Watching all the promises we ever made just fade.

[Pre-Chorus]
And I’m tired of the quiet, tired of the "fine"
Tired of you acting like your soul is worth more than mine
The pressure’s building up, the glass is gonna break
I’ve taken every single hit that I can take.

[Chorus]
So I’m screaming at the walls, I’m screaming at the ghost
Of the man I thought I loved, the one I needed most!
You stripped away my pride and you left me black and blue
Now I’m standing in the wreckage and I’m shouting it at you:
I HATE YOU!
Yeah, I said it, and I mean it tonight
I HATE YOU!
For every time you told me I wasn't right.

[Verse 2]
You walk into the kitchen, don’t even say hello
Like I’m just a piece of furniture you happen to know
You laugh at my dreams, call my passions "small"
While you’re standing on a pedestal that’s ten feet tall
But the wood is rotting out, the base is getting thin
And I’m done being the place where you dump all your sin.

[Bridge]
It’s not a quiet flame, it’s a forest fire
I’m burning every bridge, I’m the funeral pyre
You thought I’d stay silent, thought I’d stay small
But I’m the loudest voice inside these four walls!

[Chorus]
So I’m screaming at the walls, I’m screaming at the ghost
Of the man I thought I loved, the one I needed most!
You stripped away my pride and you left me black and blue
Now I’m standing in the wreckage and I’m shouting it at you:
I HATE YOU!
Yeah, I said it, and I mean it tonight
I HATE YOU!
For every time you told me I wasn't right.

[Outro]
I hate you.
God, I hate you.
Don't look at me.
Just go.

title: Jet Set
background: What nobody talks about: You are lonely in your car, in the plane and in your hotel room.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The 4:00 AM alarm is a hollow sound
A cold static echo in a silent house
Suitcase by the door, heavy as a stone
While the rest of the world is dreaming on their own.
6:00 AM departure, Gate B-24
I don’t think I can find the magic in the sky anymore
Just the smell of jet fuel and the taste of bitter tea
Wondering who this version of me is supposed to be.

[Pre-Chorus]
They call it the high life, they say that I’m blessed
But I’m just a ghost in a suit, failing the test
Of staying connected while I’m drifting away
In the blue-grey light of a breaking day.

[Chorus 1]
Oh, it’s a long way down from the jetset height
Just me and the dash-lights in the middle of the night
Driving a rental on a nameless freeway
Chasing a tomorrow that feels just like today.
Give me a rug and a slow-burning spark
Instead of these headlines and the cold and the dark
Yeah, the gold-plated life is a lonely design
When I’m just longing for home and your hand in mine.

[Verse 2]
The hotel room is perfect, sterile and white
With a view of a city I won’t see by light
Dinner for one from a plastic tray
Watching a sitcom from three years away.
The silence is heavy, it rings in my ears
It’s been the same wallpaper for five hundred years
A thousand miles south of where I should be
Locked in a tower by the side of the sea.

[Bridge]
The reflectors on the asphalt are a rhythm in the rain
A steady heartbeat for a different kind of pain
I’m over the clouds but I’m under the weather
Trying to hold all these zip codes together.

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus 2]
It’s a five-star view of an empty street
Counting the hours till we finally meet
The frequent flyer miles don’t make up the cost
Of every sunset and every moment I’ve lost.
I’d trade the sky for a seat by the fire
To put out the flame of this endless desire
To just be still, to just be known
Beyond the terminal and the dial-tone.

[Outro]
Forget the miles, forget the points
Forget the ache in my tired joints.
Just light the fire, let the cedar smoke rise
I want to see the reflection of home in your eyes.
Yeah, turn off the lights...
No more 4:00 AM flights.
Just home.

title: Just a Vibe
background: An ironic "Good Enough" series track about perfectly neutral, non-specific impressions and atmospheres.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The wall is off-white.
The rug is grey wool.
The lamp is frosted glass.
The door is particle board.
The chair is comfortable.
It is moderately warm.

[Pre-Chorus]
I feel things now.
They are not specific.
They are not strong things.
They are just impressions.
The atmosphere is here.
The feeling is general.

[Chorus]
Oh, it’s just a vibe.
Yeah, I think I like it.
It's an ambient noise.
It doesn't hurt anyone.
We can stay here now.
We can do nothing much.
It’s not bad at all.
It is perfectly neutral.

[Verse 2]
The sky is pale blue.
The road is smooth asphalt.
The grass is cut short.
The mailbox is metal grey.
The wind is gentle.
The speed is moderate.

[Pre-Chorus]
I feel things now.
They are not specific.
They are not strong things.
They are just impressions.
The atmosphere is here.
The feeling is general.

[Chorus]
Oh, it’s just a vibe.
Yeah, I think I like it.
It's an ambient noise.
It doesn't hurt anyone.
We can stay here now.
We can do nothing much.
It’s not bad at all.
It is perfectly neutral.

[Bridge]
No need for drama.
No need for high stakes.
The world is fine.
We are observing things.
It is easy like this.
It is safe right here.

[Chorus]
Oh, it’s just a vibe.
Yeah, I think I like it.
It's an ambient noise.
It doesn't hurt anyone.
We can stay here now.
We can do nothing much.
It’s not bad at all.
It is perfectly neutral.

[Outro]
Neutral.
A vibe.
It's fine.

title: Left Lane Legend
background: Going 200km/h with your business sedan on the Autobahn is a nice experience.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Boot on the floor, feel the cylinder kick
V6, V8, take your pick
The needle is climbing, the world is a blur
Listen to that precision engine purr
I’m pushing the limit, I’m breaking the seal
The asphalt is screaming beneath the wheel
No limit in sight, just a silver gray line
Everything’s moving in German design!

[Chorus]
Two-hundred klicks on the Autobahn floor
Give me the steel, give me some more!
Engineering magic, a masterclass ride
Nowhere to run and nowhere to hide
Get out of the way, I’m coming through fast
If you’re in the left lane, you’re gonna be last!

[Verse 2]
There’s a compact ahead, doing one-twenty-five
Does he even know he’s barely alive?
I’m closing the gap like a lightning strike
He’s hogging the lane that he knows I like
One flick of the wrist, the high beams flash
Move it or lose it, don't make me rash
A shimmer of silver, a blink of the eye
He’s a ghost in the mirror as I fly by!

[Bridge]
Solid as a tank, smooth as silk
Better than the rest, the cream of the milk
From Stuttgart to Munich, the concrete is mine
Purity of power, perfectly divine!

[Guitar solo]

[Chorus]
Two-hundred klicks on the Autobahn floor
Give me the steel, give me some more!
Engineering magic, a masterclass ride
Nowhere to run and nowhere to hide
Get out of the way, I’m coming through fast
If you’re in the left lane, you’re gonna be last!

[Outro]
Left lane legend!
Left lane legend!
Check your mirrors, pal...
I’m already gone.

title: Need for Speed
background: The speed is even more impressive if it's not the result from Cooper Works but based on own performance.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Got my keys in my hand, a rusty old wheel
Engine coughs to life, a low, guttural squeal
The paint's peeling off, got a dent in the side
The passenger seat's where the squirrels like to hide
They laugh when I tell 'em my car's a machine
A beautiful, beat-up, mechanical queen

[Chorus]
She ain't pretty, no, she ain't got the gleam
Just a four-wheeled bucket living out a fast dream
'Cause the needle's a-climbin' past 85 miles
Leaving all the fancy cars in a cloud of dust smiles
Yeah, the road is my canvas, the asphalt my friend
I'll drive this old wreck 'til the very end

[Verse 2]
The windows are stuck and the heater is broke
Been pulled over twice 'cause of all of the smoke
The radio's shot, just static and noise
But I've got my own music, my own roaring voice
A symphony of metal, a rattle and bang
That's the anthem I sing, the song that I sang

[Chorus]
She ain't pretty, no, she ain't got the gleam
Just a four-wheeled bucket living out a fast dream
'Cause the needle's a-climbin' past 85 miles
Leaving all the fancy cars in a cloud of dust smiles
Yeah, the road is my canvas, the asphalt my friend
I'll drive this old wreck 'til the very end

[Bridge]
They can talk about chrome and the leather so soft
The price tags are high and the payments a loft
But my freedom is cheap, no fancy expense
Just a full tank of gas and a lack of common sense

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
She ain't pretty, no, she ain't got the gleam
Just a four-wheeled bucket living out a fast dream
'Cause the needle's a-climbin' past 85 miles
Leaving all the fancy cars in a cloud of dust smiles
Yeah, the road is my canvas, the asphalt my friend
I'll drive this old wreck 'til the very end

[Outro]
Yeah, I'll drive this old wreck,
Yeah, I'll drive this old wreck,
'Til the wheels fall off!
And then I'll find another one...

title: One in a Quarter Billion
background: It is such a vast ocean of music. I am glad that you are here.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The dashboard says a hundred-thousand tracks dropped yesterday
Another ocean of sound, just to wash the light away
I’m a needle in a haystack, a grain of digital sand
Just a quiet frequency drifting through a crowded land.
They say the math is heavy, yeah, the odds are getting thin
How do you find a heartbeat in all this silicon skin?

[Pre-Chorus]
The server’s humming steady, a cold and silver glow
Counting up the millions of the names I’ll never know.
But I look at this small window, and I see a flickering light
Someone’s hitting 'play' in the middle of the night.

[Chorus]
The probability is one in two-hundred-and-fifty mil
That you’d find my voice tonight and make the world stand still.
I don't need a stadium, I don't need a crowded hall
If I’m the "one" for you, then I don't feel small at all.
Out of a quarter billion souls, you’re the one who’s listening in
And that’s enough of a miracle for me to start again.

[Verse 2]
My stats are flat and static, just a line along the floor
While the giants in the playlists keep on screaming out for more.
But there’s a comment in the corner, "This song helped me through the day"
And suddenly the algorithms just fade into the gray.
Why chase a ghost of glory or a million hollow views?
When I can speak to one of you and give you something you can use.

[Bridge]
One over two-hundred-and-fifty million
The math says I’m invisible, a ghost inside the code
But music isn't data, and it isn't just a road.
It’s a wire through the darkness, it’s a hand across the sea
And the fact that you can hear me... is enough of a legacy.

[Chorus]
Yeah, the probability is one in two-hundred-and-fifty mil
That you’d find my voice tonight and make the world stand still.
I don't need a stadium, I don't need a crowded hall
If I’m the "one" for you, then I don't feel small at all.

[Outro]
One in a quarter billion...
And you’re right here.
Yeah, you’re right here.
That's plenty for me.

title: Rocker Songwriter
background: The transformation from a quiet singer-songwriter to a powerful rock artist.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
C major and a cup of lukewarm chamomile tea
That’s how every writing session begins for me
A simple melody, a tale of rain and doubt
Whispered words that never really want to shout
I sit here cross-legged, hair tied back tight and neat
A folksy little stanza that’s bittersweet.
They call me "sensitive", "a poet of the soul"
Trying to fit my story in a tiny, perfect hole.

[Pre-Chorus]
But when I strum this vintage six-string, something feels astray
My fingers want to move a different, faster way
I close my eyes and hear a faint, distorted roar
A beat inside my chest that keeps demanding more.

[Chorus]
Oh, I thought I was a singer-songwriter, a whisper in the crowd
Barefoot on the stage, never singing too loud.
I thought my truth was found in quiet minor keys
A gentle breeze, rustling through the weeping trees.
But there’s a hum beneath the silence, a low and steady burn…

[Verse 2]
The coffee got cold and the chamomile is gone
I'm hitting chords too hard, staying up until the dawn.
The pen won't write a ballad, it only draws a scream
Of a high-gain amplifier, living out a dream.
I look at the poster of my acoustic hero's face
And realize that I feel utterly out of place.
My boots are scuffed, my shirt has a tear down the side
This 'gentle spirit' persona, I can no longer hide.

[Pre-Chorus]
Now I’m not strumming softly, I’m attacking the wood
A frantic, primal rhythm, finally understood.
I open up my throat and let the air escape
This quiet little song is beginning to reshape!

[Chorus]
Oh, I thought I was a singer-songwriter, a whisper in the crowd
Barefoot on the stage, never singing too loud.
I thought my truth was found in quiet minor keys
A gentle breeze, rustling through the weeping trees.
BUT THERE'S A HUM BENEATH THE SILENCE, A LOW AND STEADY BURN...
It’s time for this whole quiet, pretty chapter to turn!

[Bridge]
No more apologies, no more holding back the sound!
I'm plugging in the cable right into the ground!
The feedback is singing! The drum kit is a fight!
This isn't a poem, this is pure electric light!
The leather jacket's on, the eyeliner is thick!
This is my real skin, this is my final trick!

[Outro Chorus]
Forget the tea! Forget the rain!
It was always gasoline running through my veins!
I’m not a whisper, I’m a SHOUT!
Let the speakers blow, let the power run out!

[Final Chorus/Outro]
I AM A ROCK GIRL! HEAR THE RHYTHM, FEEL THE FIRE!
A THOUSAND WATTS HIGHER!
I AM A ROCK GIRL! PLUGGED IN AND UNDONE!
MY TRUE SONG HAS BEGUN!

title: School's Out
background: The joy of leaving school and the freedom of a new beginning. Challenging instrumentals and vocals.
lyrics:
[Intro]
School's out! Whoo!

[Verse 1]
The weight is lifted, the syllabus torn
This is the very first day that we're truly born
I feel the sunlight cutting through the old haze
Trading in the textbooks for the open road days
No more formulas, no more required reading
Just a wild heartbeat, and a life worth leading
The air is different, it tastes like sweet release
A ticket to anywhere, a brand new lease!

[Pre-Chorus]
We stood at the junction, felt the pressure and the heat
Now the engine's running, tapping out a brand new beat
The rearview mirror shows the history gone
'Cause the next great story is the one we're standing upon!

[Chorus]
OH, THE HORIZON LINE HIGH! Yeah, we're climbing the view!
Got that electric fire in everything we do!
Leave the past behind, chasing down the gold rush
The future is calling, and it's worth the rush!
Every single star is lining up for me
This is the sound of pure possibility!

[Verse 2]
Used to dream in whispers, hiding under the desk
Now we're shouting the plans, putting joy to the test
The world is a canvas, and we're holding the brush
Painting bright colours in the absolute hush
Of the morning calm, before the daily race starts
We got the power and the fire in our hungry hearts
Forget the failures, forget the small slips
Got big ideas rolling right off our lips!

[Pre-Chorus]
We stood at the junction, felt the pressure and the heat
Now the engine's running, tapping out a brand new beat
The rearview mirror shows the history gone
'Cause the next great story is the one we're standing upon!

[Chorus]
OH, THE HORIZON LINE HIGH! Yeah, we're climbing the view!
Got that electric fire in everything we do!
Leave the past behind, chasing down the gold rush
The future is calling, and it's worth the rush!
Every single star is lining up for me
This is the sound of pure possibility!

[Rap]
Check the mic, one-two, yeah, the dial is set to max
Used to chase the answers on those laminated facts
Now the goal is freedom, the currency is soul
Taking zero shortcuts, heading straight for the goal!
See the world spinning? We're about to jump in
No more permission slips, no second guessing, we begin!
Got the blueprint drawn, got the mindset tight and clean
This ain't a finish line, fam, it's a starting scene!
From the classroom chatter to the engine's roar and hum
We made it through the fire, now watch the future come!
Yeah!

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
OH, THE HORIZON LINE HIGH! Yeah, we're climbing the view!
Got that electric fire in everything we do!
Leave the past behind, chasing down the gold rush
The future is calling, and it's worth the rush!
Every single star is lining up for me
This is the sound of pure possibility!

[Outro]
POSSIBILITY!
Feel that good vibe!
We are ready!
Horizon Line High!

title: Siblings
background: I love her from my heart.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Another Tuesday, another fight
You leave the door and slam it shut with all your might
I'm standing here, my heart is pounding in my ears
And for a moment, I could drown in all these years
Of misunderstandings, of biting words we throw
It's just the way it's been since we were small, you know
We're oil and water, sun and bitter, stormy rain
One second it's a laugh, the next it's just a pain

[Chorus]
'Cause I can't stand your presence, and I love you from my heart
It's a twisted, tangled mess right from the very start
We push and pull, we break and bend, we say we're through
But a part of me is always and forever you

[Verse 2]
The phone rings late, you're crying on the other end
And all the anger just dissolves, my oldest friend
I'm in my car before I even think it through
There's no one else on earth I'd rather rush to, but you
We sit in silence on the sofa for a while
And all it takes is just a little, broken smile
For all the hurt to fade, like footprints in the sand
We don't need words to finally understand

[Chorus]
'Cause I can't stand your presence, and I love you from my heart
It's a twisted, tangled mess right from the very start
We push and pull, we break and bend, we say we're through
But a part of me is always and forever you

[Bridge]
They say we're mirrors of each other's darkest sides
The one who knows exactly where the other hides
The secrets and the fears we'd never tell a soul
You're half of me that makes the other half feel whole

[Chorus]
'Cause I can't stand your presence, and I love you from my heart
It's a twisted, tangled mess right from the very start
We push and pull, we break and bend, we say we're through
But a part of me is always and forever you!

[Outro]
Yeah, a part of me is always and forever you
Through every fight and every single thing we do
The one I love, the one I sometimes can't stand
The girl who'll always be the sister of my hand.

title: Slippery Road
background: The painful dissolution of a relationship through the metaphor of a car losing control on a frozen road
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You used to hold the door like it was a holy rite,
Tracing circles on my palm in the middle of the night.
You said my eyes were steady stars, your only way back home,
You built a kingdom for us two and put me on the throne.
But lately, you don’t look at me, you’re looking past my shoulder,
The fire that used to keep us warm is turning gray and colder.

[Chorus]
Slow it down, baby, can’t you feel the wheels spin?
The ice is getting thinner and the walls are closing in.
You’re losing your grip, you’re letting go of the load,
Watch your step now—we’re on a slippery road.
One wrong move and we’re spinning out of control,
You’re saving your pride but you’re losing my soul.

[Verse 2]
The hand that used to find my waist is heavy by your side,
I’m reaching out for anything, but you’ve got nowhere to hide.
You’re picking speed on empty streets, ignoring every sign,
Forgetting how you promised that your heart was tied to mine.
The silence in the driver’s seat is louder than a scream,
You’re drifting out of reach now, like a half-forgotten dream.

[Chorus]
Slow it down, baby, can’t you feel the wheels spin?
The ice is getting thinner and the walls are closing in.
You’re losing your grip, you’re letting go of the load,
Watch your step now—we’re on a slippery road.
One wrong move and we’re spinning out of control,
You’re saving your pride but you’re losing my soul.

[Verse 3]
I remember when you’d linger just to hear me breathe,
Now you’re looking for a reason or an opening to leave.
You treat my love like gravity—a thing you just expect,
While you pave the way with coldness and a jagged-edged neglect.
The map we drew is freezing over, white-out in the glass,
I’m praying for a salt-truck but I watch the minutes pass.

[Guitar solo]

[Bridge]
The friction’s gone, the traction’s thin,
I don’t know where you end and where the ghosts begin.
You adore the girl I was, but you hate the woman here,
I’m shouting through the windshield, but you’ve closed your inner ear.
It’s a long way down when the pavement turns to glass.

[Chorus]
Slow it down, baby, can’t you feel the wheels spin?
The ice is getting thinner and the walls are closing in.
You’re losing your grip, you’re letting go of the load,
Watch your step now—we’re on a slippery road.
One wrong move and we’re spinning out of control,
You’re saving your pride but you’re losing my soul.

[Outro]
We’re sliding...
You used to worship the ground I walked on.
Now you don’t even see the ice.
Mind the curve, baby.
We’re on a slippery road...

title: Tabby Gonzalez
background: The story of how a girl with mental health challenges calls her cat.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Woke up this mornin' to a sound, a little meow and a purr
Yeah, my feline friend, she's Tabby G, she's the one I prefer
Got a streak of white right down her nose, a tabby coat so fine
And when she gives that little head nudge, she blows my mind

[Chorus]
Oh, Tabby Gonzalez, yeah, she's the queen of the house
Moves like a ninja, quiet as a mouse
She'll tear up the couch, she'll knock down your vase
But you can't be mad at that sweet, furry face

[Verse 2]
She's got a swagger when she walks, a little hip in her sway
A cardboard box is a palace, where she'll spend her day
She's a hunter in the kitchen, a lion on the floor
And when that can of tuna pops, she'll ask for more

[Chorus]
Oh, Tabby Gonzalez, yeah, she's the queen of the house
Moves like a ninja, quiet as a mouse
She'll tear up the couch, she'll knock down your vase
But you can't be mad at that sweet, furry face

[Guitar Solo]

[Bridge]
She'll be sleeping in the sunshine, she'll be twitchin' in her dreams
You might think she's a diva, but she's not what she seems
'Cause when the day is done, and the world is still and calm
She'll curl up on my lap, safe and sound from all harm

[Outro]
Tabby G! Oh, Tabby Gonzalez!
Yeah, Tabby G!
... Wait, where'd she go?

title: The Hook
background: From the "Good Enough" series; a song designed to stick using manufactured climax and simple melodies.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Drums just dropped. The kick is here.
Bass line works. It is standard now.
The vocal is low. It sounds intimate.
We are building tension. This is the plan.
Synth pad is rising. It must be loud.
Wait for the signal. The verse must end.

[Pre-Chorus]
I hear the hi-hats. They are getting faster.
I know what happens. You know it too.
The music is changing. It's climbing high.
It must climb higher. Before the release.
I have a feeling. It is manufactured.
You must feel it now. You must feel it soon.

[Chorus]
The Hook Is Coming. Get ready for impact.
The Hook Is Coming. This is the climax now.
The Hook Is Coming. The melody is simple.
The Hook Is Coming. It's designed to stick.
I'm singing louder. The backing vocals hit.
You will remember this. You will repeat it.

[Verse 2]
The energy drops. But only a bit.
We must sustain this. For radio play.
The chords are the same. They did not change.
New vocal inflection. To sound fresh now.
The listener is back. They are still here.
They are waiting again. For the next part.

[Pre-Chorus]
I hear the hi-hats. They are getting faster.
I know what happens. You know it too.
The music is changing. It's climbing high.
It must climb higher. Before the release.
I have a feeling. It is manufactured.
You must feel it now. You must feel it soon.

[Chorus]
The Hook Is Coming. Get ready for impact.
The Hook Is Coming. This is the climax now.
The Hook Is Coming. The melody is simple.
The Hook Is Coming. It's designed to stick.
I'm singing louder. The backing vocals hit.
You will remember this. You will repeat it.

[Bridge]
Eight bar breakdown. Just the instrumental.
We need a pause now. To reset the ear.
Reverb is heavy. The bass is deep.
The engineer says. This will peak well.
Now we return. The moment is done.

[Chorus]
The Hook Is Coming. Get ready for impact.
The Hook Is Coming. This is the climax now.
The Hook Is Coming. The melody is simple.
The Hook Is Coming. It's designed to stick.
I'm singing louder. The backing vocals hit.
You will remember this. You will repeat it.

title: This is Fine
background: A song exploring the exact prompting of a timeline, hitting three minutes for streaming metrics.
lyrics:
[0:00 - 0:25 - Section A: Introduction - Spoken/Whispered, heavy reverb, very slow]
Listen now.
Just the pads.
Hold the note.
This is the moment.
The moment to breathe.

[0:25 - 0:50 - Section B: The Loop - Sung, flat monotone]
This is fine.
We are resting now.
This is fine.
We are resting now.
The emotion is handled.
By the sound of the reverb.

[0:50 - 1:15 - Section C: Descriptive Narration, very slow tempo]
The loop is eight seconds.
It repeats softly.
It adds to the minute count.
No need for singing now.
The structure is simple.
It must be simple here.

[1:15 - 1:40 - Section B Repeat: The Loop - Sung, flat monotone]
This is fine.
We are resting now.
This is fine.
We are resting now.
The emotion is handled.
By the sound of the reverb.

[1:40 - 2:05 - Section D: The Padded Runtime - Whispered, slightly distorted/filtered]
We are still here.
You are still listening.
The time keeps moving.
The song keeps playing.
It needs to reach three minutes.
For the streaming numbers.
It needs the full length.

[2:05 - 2:30 - Section B Repeat: The Loop - Sung, flat monotone, slightly louder]
This is fine.
We are resting now.
This is fine.
We are resting now.
The emotion is handled.
By the sound of the reverb.

[2:30 - 2:50 - Section E: Minimal Change]
The chords shift slightly.
Just for a moment.
Now they return back.
To the main sequence.
We showed a difference.
We satisfied the listener.

[2:50 - 3:00 - Outro - Spoken/Whispered, fading out, heavy delay]
The three minutes are done.
The track is ending now.
That was easy.
Total time elapsed...
Moving on now.
This is fine.

title: Toccata
background: A bilingual fusion featuring my performance of Bach’s Toccata in D minor, exploring the meaning of the Italian word "toccare" (to touch).
lyrics:
[Intro]
Toccare... Toccare...

[Verse 1]
The melody is dark, the rhythm is a pulse
My fingers on the keyboard, nothing else.
It started with a whisper, a gentle invitation,
Now it's a deep vibration, pure sensation.
I trace the lines, I feel the charge, the static air,
A silent promise hanging there, a desperate prayer.
This darkness that surrounds us, it only makes it clearer,
I need to pull you closer, ti voglio più vicina.

[Prechorus]
No hesitation now, just pure electrical flow,
I need to feel it now, I need to let it go.
I want to breach the distance, the space between the beat,
Ready for the moment, feel the heat!
Tocca me, baby!

[Chorus]
Don't break the moment, don't stop the sound,
Lost in the rhythm, turning 'round and 'round.
I’ve got you where I want you, right here in the dark,
You are the music leaving its mark!
Sei Toccata!

[Verse 2]
My skin is buzzing, like the speakers in the floor,
This energy you give me, I'm craving something more.
You don't need to speak, the language is in the hands,
Following the motion, following your commands.
Sento il tuo respiro, I feel your breath upon my neck,
Breaking every boundary, ignoring every check.
Let the rhythm guide us through this dark, hypnotic haze,
Lost in the fire of these electric ways.

[Prechorus]
There’s no turning back, the spell is cast tonight,
Give me that connection, with all your heat and light.
I want to close the circuit, the gap is getting small,
Ready for the moment, give your all!
Tocca me, baby!

[Chorus]
Don't break the moment, don't stop the sound,
Lost in the rhythm, turning 'round and 'round.
I’ve got you where I want you, right here in the dark,
You are the music leaving its mark!
Sei Toccata!

[Bridge]
Toccami piano...
The history, the feeling, the darkness of the sound.
From the organ's pipes to the speakers on the ground.
Toccami forte...
A thousand years of music, now pulsing through the air.
The feeling is electric, a touch beyond compare.

[Chorus]
Don't break the moment, don't stop the sound,
Lost in the rhythm, turning 'round and 'round.
I’ve got you where I want you, right here in the dark,
You are the music leaving its mark!
Sei Toccata!

[Outro]
Sì, Toccata...

title: Verona
background: A "singularity" track: a tragic love story sung by two vocalists in three languages simultaneously.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
[English]
A pale moon watched in silence, above the ancient stone,
A secret oath was whispered, where only we were known.
The air was thick with danger, a hatred deep and old,
A tragic tale of sorrow, that soon would be untold.
We met beneath the shadows, where rival flags could fall,
Ignoring every warning, answering love's call.
Though dawn would surely find us, and tear us far apart,
The moment felt eternal, locked within the heart.

[Chorus]
[Italian]
O, amore mio, perché?
Un fuoco ardente che non kann morire.
Siamo stelle cadenti nel cielo scuro,
Un bacio rubato, un destino impuro.
Non c'è pace ohne dich, la mia vita,
Il veleno è dolce, la notte è già finita.

[Verse 2]
[German]
Ich sah den Haus in ihren Blicken, kalt und starr,
Die Mauern uns'rer Häuser, alt und wunderbar.
Ich wünschte mir, wir könnten diesen Eid zerbrechen,
Bevor die Lords des Zorns sich an uns rächen.
Die Sonne ging dann auf, ein Signal für den Streit,
Wir sind Gefangene der Zeit und der Feindseligkeit.
Der Tod ist unser Wächter, er wartet schon bereit,
Ein stilles, dunkles Ende, für alle Ewigkeit.

[Chorus]
[Italian]
O, amore mio, perché?
Un fuoco ardente che non kann morire.
Siamo stelle cadenti nel cielo scuro,
Un bacio rubato, un destino impuro.
Non c'è pace ohne dich, la mia vita,
Il veleno è dolce, la notte è già finita.

[Bridge]
[Italian]
They tried to tear us down, with steel and angry might,
But in the crypt, we found the ending of the fight.

[German]
Ein letzter Kuss, so bitter, wie der letzte Wein,
Kein Morgenlicht wird wieder für uns beide scheinen.

[English]
Though the world condemned us, and broke our fragile bloom,

[German]
Vereint im Grab, entkommen wir dem kalten, leeren Raum.

[Outro]
[Italian]
Per sempre, amore mio.

title: Whiteout
background: Trapped in a literal and emotional whiteout, the loss of intimacy and the warmth of the past as the relationship succumbs to a freezing, silent isolation.
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The heater’s been blowing nothing but clutched-up dust
Now we’re just two shadows in a blur of white and grey.
I can’t see the hood, let alone the road
And you haven’t found a single word to say.
The windshield’s frosting over from the inside out
A crystal map of everything we’re living without.

[Chorus]
We’re caught in the whiteout, losing the line
Between where you end and the ice begins to climb.
I’m shivering in the seat, reaching for the ghost
Of that girl—the one who used to laugh at how the snow tasted.
But now the air is thin and the engine’s gone cold
And we’re just a story that’s been left out in the snow.

[Verse 2]
I close my eyes and I can see my father’s porch
The yellow light spilling out across the lawn
I remember how the radiator used to hiss and torch
The winter chill until the ache was gone.
Back then, "home" was a feeling, a heavy wool rug
A kitchen that held me in a permanent hug.
Now I’m staring at your profile in the dashboard glow
Wondering how we got buried under all this snow.

[Bridge]
You’re spinning the tires, making that high-pitched whine in the slush
We’re sinking down, and the world is getting lush.
You’re just counting the cracks in the steering wheel
While you say, "Wait for the morning, the plow will come through",
But the morning feels like a different lifetime with you.
I’d trade this whole silence for a spark or a flame
But you don’t even whisper the syllables of my name.

[Guitar Solo]

[Outro]
I’m homesick for a house that doesn't exist anymore.
Just a girl by a fireplace, safe behind the door.
The windows are rattling.
The sky is turning lead.
We’re freezing in the silence of the things we never said.
just snow...
Nothing but snow...

title: Winterstorm
background: Against the backdrop of a literal winter storm, a couple whose relationship has become emotionally frozen
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The salt is thick on the driveway, white against the grey
You’re moving through the kitchen in that practiced, quiet way
I’m watching how the pilot light flickers in the draft
While you’re measuring the coffee grounds like an ancient, heavy craft.
The windows hum a little when the North wind hits the glass
We’re just huddling in the kitchen, waiting for the front to pass.

[Chorus 1]
But it’s a dry kind of winter, the kind that cracks the skin
And I can’t tell if the ice is out there, or if it’s settled in
We’re keeping up the furnace, we’re burning through the wood
But we’re shivering in a house where the insulation’s good.
Yeah, the sky is turning violet, and the roads are closing down
But it’s been a long December since a fire was found.

[Verse 2]
You used to be my woodsmoke, you used to be the thaw
Now you’re just the jagged edge of everything I saw
We’re sleeping ‘neath the heavy quilts, four layers deep at least
But there’s a miles-wide valley between the west side and the east.
I reached out for your shoulder, just to see if you were real
You just tightened up the fabric, like a lock against the steel.

[Guitar solo]

[Bridge]
The power lines are sagging, crying under all that weight
It’s funny how a little frost can decide a person's fate.
Do we wait for April? Do we wait for things to bloom?
Or are we just two statues in a temporary room?

[Chorus 2]
Yeah, it’s a cruel kind of winter, and it’s right here in the hall
And the way we’re acting "civil" is the coldest part of all.
We’re checking all the gaskets, we’re taping up the seams
But the frost is moving inward, past the pipes and through our dreams.
Now the driveway’s buried over, and the salt has all run out
And I’ve forgotten what it’s like to live without the doubt.

[Outro]
The plow is on the main road, I can hear the distant scrape
But there isn’t any shovel that can help us with this shape.

Just the white noise.
Just the white out.
Stay cold, then.
